main event: On 25 Sep 61, Captain Gillen and a crew member observed one bright white light while enroute to Guam.
interesting points: The light was estimated to be the size of a star., The light was visible for approximately 10 seconds before disappearing., The sighting possibly suggests an astronomical phenomenon., There were multiple observers who reported seeing a very bright white object in the sky around the same time., The object was seen moving from east to west at about 20 degrees above the horizon.
witness description: Captain Gillen and a crew member
